short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Remind yourself to donate to charity when you shop online. Over 20 Lansing charities to pick from!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Donate to your favorite charity after you buy something online. Every penny goes to your choice of over 20 Lansing charities.

Donating doesn't have to interrupt your busy schedule, it should be free and easy. Help us revolutionize online giving. Try the extension today!

Want to discover more amazing charities? Check out https://blog.givingjar.org.
